Text: Lincoln Brewster: Wow such a great Christmas album. Thank you TorrrentTracts. I've been looking everywhere for this one. Your music is great. Thank you so much
Another great collection. Any chance of getting the new David Phelps - Classic at some point, I have been waiting for that one.
Thanks again and as always keep up the good work!
i found some older torrents you did that do not appear to have seeders any longer. any chance to reseed them. They are 3 for 1 & Kirk Talley. I would really appreciate them.

Hey TT, First would like to thank you for your input in these torrents, much appreciated. . . I do longdistance trucking for a life so for me to attend a church service or just fellowship is almost a zero, but thanks to your input i can atleast listern to these "audio sermons" as i like to call it. It makes the road so much better. . Do you have anything on Geoff Bullock and Lindell Cooley perhaps, two of the greatest praise and worship pioneers . . .
Do you have any Melissa Otto?

Transkaro, although obviously not on the same level as you do professionally, I too do a lot of driving. So I can appreciate that alone time with the Lord. I didn't have any Geoff Bullock, but I had four Lindell Cooley albums I put up for you yesterday.
Roro1979, I'm afraid I don't have any Melissa Otto in my collection.  Sorry about that.

Studog123, I'm not a big fan of going back and breathing new life into my old torrents. It defeats the very purpose of a torrent in the first place. But if you can't get any seeders on those two discographies after a week or so, please let me know.

Torrenttracts God Bless and Thanks for the music it has really helped me Grow.Two things I request,,, 1.could you upload shirley caesars HE WILL COME album. 2,Could you upload more Christian reggae, christian dancehall/riddims and christian Zouk?Thanks for the Stitchie and Sherwin Gardner.Other such artists are like Osmond Collins, Positive, vanesa mardueno,  silent sah, imisi, monty G, Dafari, livingstone jason mighty, sean sobers, ruth vega, suz-eye etc
